resources.string: Home page showing the current library.
Has various button to control the actual audioplayer, like: pause/play, jump back/forwards etc.
Makes it possible to buy this book, links to store to show other books by author/genre and shows a list of friends who have read it
Contains a searchbar to browse for different books, shows list of books
Has a searchbar to look for new friends and shows a list of your current friends/search results
Shows some personal information about friend and shows which books your friend is reading/has read
